00058 UpdatesManager::UpdatesManager( QString currentVersion )
00059 :QObject(),
00060  m_networkAccessManager( new QNetworkAccessManager() ),
00061  m_reply( 0 ),
00062  m_httpRequestAborted( false ),
00063  m_osType( QLatin1String( "" ) ),
00064  m_currentVersion( currentVersion ),
00065  m_latestVersion( QLatin1String( "" ) ),
00066  m_filelist(),
00067  m_fileReply( 0 ),
00068  m_fileRequestAborted( false ),
00069  m_file( 0 ),
00070  m_filedownloaded( 0 )
00071 {
00072         DeleteOldFiles();
00073 
00074 
00075 #if defined( Q_WS_MAC )
00076         m_osType = QLatin1String( "mac" );
00077 #endif
00078 
00079 #if defined( Q_WS_WIN )
00080         m_osType = QLatin1String( "win" );
00081 #endif
00082 
00083 #if defined( Q_WS_X11 )
00084         m_osType = QLatin1String( "linux" );
00085 #endif
00086 
00087 #if defined( __x86_64__ )
00088         m_osType += QLatin1String( "_64" );
00089 #endif
00090 
00091 }

00096 UpdatesManager::~UpdatesManager()
00097 {
00098         delete m_networkAccessManager;

00104 void UpdatesManager::CheckForUpdates()
00105 {
00106         //Esta direcci�n no es v�lida, solo para probar
00107         QUrl url( QLatin1String( "http://tonatiuh.googlecode.com/svn/updates/latest.xml" ) );
00108 
00109     // schedule the request
00110     m_httpRequestAborted = false;
00111 
00112     m_reply = m_networkAccessManager->get( QNetworkRequest( url ) );
00113     connect( m_reply, SIGNAL( finished() ), this, SLOT( CheckLastUpdate() ) );
00114     connect( m_reply, SIGNAL( readyRead() ), this, SLOT( Read() ) );
00115 
00116 }
00117 
00122 void UpdatesManager::CheckLastUpdate()
00123 {
00124         if( m_httpRequestAborted )
00125         {
00126                 m_reply->deleteLater();
00127                 return;
00128         }
00129 
00130         // Check file type
00131         QDomDocument doc( QLatin1String( "XML" ) );
00132         if( !doc.setContent( m_lastUpdateData, true ) ) return;
00133 
00134 
00135         QDomElement root = doc.documentElement();
00136         if( root.tagName() != QLatin1String( "appname" ) ) return;
00137 
00138 
00139         // Loop over main nodes
00140         m_latestVersion.clear();
00141         m_filelist.clear();
00142         m_executableFilelist.clear();
00143 
00144         QDomNode mainnode = root.firstChild();
00145         while( !mainnode.isNull() )
00146         {
00147                 QDomNode subnode = mainnode.firstChild();
00148         if( !subnode.isNull() )
00149         {
00150             // Loop over each elements in subnodes
00151             while( !subnode.isNull() )
00152             {
00153                 QDomElement e = subnode.toElement();
00154                 if( !e.isNull() )
00155                 {
00156                         if( e.tagName() == QLatin1String( "version" ) )
00157                                 m_latestVersion = e.attribute( QLatin1String( "value" ), QLatin1String( "" ));
00158 
00159                         if( ( e.tagName() == QLatin1String( "os" )  ) && ( e.attribute( QLatin1String( "value" ), QLatin1String( "" )  ) == m_osType ) )
00160                         {
00161                                 QDomNode ossubnode = subnode.firstChild();
00162                                 while( !ossubnode.isNull())
00163                                 {
00164                                         QDomElement e = ossubnode.toElement();
00165                                         if( e.tagName() == QLatin1String( "file" ) )
00166                                         {
00167                                                 QString type = e.attribute( QLatin1String( "type" ), QLatin1String( "" ) );
00168                                                 QString fileName = e.attribute( QLatin1String( "value" ), QLatin1String( "" ) );
00169                                                 m_filelist.insertMulti( type, fileName );
00170 
00171 
00172                                                 QString executable = e.attribute( QLatin1String( "executable" ), QLatin1String( "false" ) );
00173                                                 if( executable == "true" )      m_executableFilelist.push_back( fileName );
00174                                         }
00175 
00176                                         ossubnode = ossubnode.nextSibling();
00177                                 }
00178                         }
00179 
00180 
00181                                 }
00182                                 subnode = subnode.nextSibling();
00183                         }
00184                 }
00185                 mainnode = mainnode.nextSibling();
00186         }
00187 
00188         // Compare current version with the one on the server
00189         if( m_currentVersion < m_latestVersion )
00190         {
00191                 QString text =  QString( tr( "New Version of Tonatiuh is available: %1\nWould you like to download and install it?" )  ).arg( m_latestVersion );
00192 
00193 
00194                 // Check if user wants to download
00195                 if( QMessageBox::question( 0, QLatin1String( "Tonatiuh" ),
00196                                 text, QMessageBox::Yes | QMessageBox::No, QMessageBox::Yes )
00197                         == QMessageBox::No )    return;
00198 
00199                 // Start Download
00200                 m_filedownloaded = 0;
00201                 UpdateDownload( 0 );
00202         }
00203         else{
00204                 // Update success dialog
00205                 QMessageBox::information( 0, QLatin1String("Tonatiuh"), tr("You are using the latest version." ) );
00206         }
00207         m_lastUpdateData = QLatin1String( "" );
00208 }

00213 void UpdatesManager::Read()
00214 {
00215         m_lastUpdateData.append( QString::fromAscii( m_reply->readAll() ) );
00216 }

00222 void UpdatesManager::ReadFile()
00223 {
00224         if( m_file ) m_file->write( m_fileReply->readAll() );
00225 }
00226 
00230 void UpdatesManager::FileDownloadComplete()
00231 {
00232         m_file->close();
00233 
00234         if( m_fileRequestAborted )
00235         {
00236                 if( m_file )
00237                 {
00238                         m_file->close();
00239                         m_file->remove();
00240                         delete m_file;
00241                         m_file = 0;
00242                 }
00243                 m_fileReply->deleteLater();
00244                 return;
00245         }
00246         else
00247                 m_filedownloaded++;
00248 
00249         m_fileReply->deleteLater();
00250         m_fileReply = 0;
00251         delete m_file;
00252         m_file = 0;
00253 
00254         UpdateDownload( m_filedownloaded );
00255 
00256 }

00260 void UpdatesManager::UpdateDownload( int fileIndex )
00261 {
00262         QDir currentDir( qApp->applicationDirPath() );
00263         currentDir.cdUp();
00264         currentDir.cdUp();
00265 
00266         // Create a temporary folder
00267         if( !currentDir.exists( QLatin1String( "tmp" ) ) )      currentDir.mkdir( QLatin1String( "tmp" ) );
00268         QDir tmpDir( currentDir.absoluteFilePath( QLatin1String( "tmp" ) ) );
00269         int nNewFiles = m_filelist.count( QLatin1String( "new" ) );
00270         int nReplaceFiles =  m_filelist.count( QLatin1String( "replace" ) );
00271 
00272         if( ( fileIndex < nNewFiles ) & ( fileIndex < m_filelist.size() ) )
00273         {
00274                 QList< QString>  newFiles = m_filelist.values ( QLatin1String( "new" ) );
00275 
00276                 QString urlPath = QString( QLatin1String( "http://tonatiuh.googlecode.com/svn/updates/release-%1/%2/%3" ) ).arg( m_latestVersion, m_osType, newFiles[fileIndex] );
00277                 QString saveFileName = tmpDir.absoluteFilePath( newFiles[fileIndex] );
00278 
00279                 DownloadFile( urlPath, saveFileName );
00280         }
00281         else if( ( fileIndex >= nNewFiles ) && ( fileIndex < ( nReplaceFiles + nNewFiles ) ) && ( fileIndex < m_filelist.size() ) )
00282         {
00283                 int replaceFileIndex = fileIndex - nNewFiles;
00284                 QList< QString>  replaceFiles = m_filelist.values ( QLatin1String( "replace" ) );
00285 
00286                 QString urlPath = QString( QLatin1String( "http://tonatiuh.googlecode.com/svn/updates/release-%1/%2/%3" ) ).arg( m_latestVersion, m_osType, replaceFiles[replaceFileIndex] );
00287                 QString saveFileName = tmpDir.absoluteFilePath( replaceFiles[replaceFileIndex] );
00288 
00289                 DownloadFile( urlPath, saveFileName );
00290         }
00291         else if( m_filedownloaded == (  nReplaceFiles + nNewFiles  ) )
00292         {
00293                 //New files
00294                 QList<QString> newFiles = m_filelist.values ( QLatin1String( "new" ) );
00295 
00296                 for( int i = 0; i < newFiles.size(); i++ )
00297                 {
00298                         QString currentFileName = currentDir.absoluteFilePath( newFiles[i] );
00299                         QString newFileName = tmpDir.absoluteFilePath( newFiles[i] );
00300 
00301 
00302                         QFileInfo currentFileInfo( currentFileName );
00303                         currentDir.relativeFilePath ( currentFileInfo.absolutePath() );
00304                         currentDir.mkpath( currentDir.relativeFilePath ( currentFileInfo.absolutePath() ) );
00305 
00306                         QFile newFile( newFileName );
00307                         newFile.rename( currentFileName );
00308                         if( m_executableFilelist.contains( newFiles[i] ) )      newFile.setPermissions( QFile::ExeOwner | QFile::ReadOwner      | QFile::WriteOwner );
00309                 }
00310 
00311                 //Replace files. Backup old files and rename them
00312                 QList<QString>  replaceFiles = m_filelist.values ( QLatin1String( "replace" ) );
00313 
00314                 // Backup old files and rename them
00315                 for( int i = 0; i < replaceFiles.size(); i++ )
00316                 {
00317                         QString currentFileName = currentDir.absoluteFilePath( replaceFiles[i] );
00318                         QString newFileName = tmpDir.absoluteFilePath( replaceFiles[i] );
00319                         QString oldFileName = currentFileName + QLatin1String( ".old" );
00320 
00321                         QFile currentFile( currentFileName );
00322                         currentFile.rename( oldFileName );
00323 
00324                         QFile newFile( newFileName );
00325                         newFile.rename( currentFileName );
00326                         if( m_executableFilelist.contains( replaceFiles[i] ) )  newFile.setPermissions( QFile::ExeOwner | QFile::ReadOwner      | QFile::WriteOwner );
00327 
00328                 }
00329 
00330                 //Remove files. Backup old files
00331                 QList< QString>  removeFiles = m_filelist.values ( QLatin1String( "remove" ) );
00332 
00333                 // Backup old files and rename them
00334                 for( int i = 0; i < removeFiles.size(); i++ )
00335                 {
00336                         QString currentFileName = currentDir.absoluteFilePath( removeFiles[i] );
00337                         QString oldFileName = currentFileName + QLatin1String( ".old" );
00338 
00339                         QFile currentFile( currentFileName );
00340                         currentFile.rename( oldFileName );
00341                 }
00342 
00343                 //Removes tmp dir
00344                 RemoveDir( tmpDir.absolutePath() );
00345 
00346                 QMessageBox::information( 0,  QLatin1String( "Tonatiuh"), tr("Please restart Tonatiuh for updates to take effect." ) );
00347         }
00348  }

00354 void UpdatesManager::DeleteDirOldFiles( QString dirName )
00355 {
00356         QDir currentDir( dirName );
00357         currentDir.setFilter( QDir::AllEntries | QDir::NoDotAndDotDot );
00358         currentDir.setSorting( QDir::DirsFirst  | QDir::Name );
00359 
00360         QStringList fileList = currentDir.entryList();
00361         for( int i = 0; i < fileList.size(); ++i )
00362         {
00363                 QFileInfo fileOrDir( currentDir, fileList[i] );
00364                 if( fileOrDir.isDir() ) DeleteDirOldFiles( currentDir.absoluteFilePath( fileList[i] ) );
00365                 else if( ( !fileOrDir.isDir() ) && (  fileOrDir.suffix() == QLatin1String( "old" ) ) )
00366                 {
00367                         QFile oldFile( currentDir.absoluteFilePath( fileList[i] ) );
00368                         oldFile.remove();
00369                 }
00370         }
00371 
00372 }
00373 
00377 void UpdatesManager::DeleteOldFiles()
00378 {
00379         QDir appDir( qApp->applicationDirPath() );
00380         appDir.cdUp();
00381         appDir.cdUp();
00382         DeleteDirOldFiles( appDir.absolutePath() );
00383 }

00388 void UpdatesManager::DownloadFile( QString urlPath, QString saveFileName  )
00389 {
00390         QUrl url( urlPath );
00391         if( QFile::exists( saveFileName ) )
00392         {
00393                 if( QMessageBox::question( 0, QLatin1String("Tonatiuh"), tr("There already exists a file called %1 in "
00394                         "the current directory. Overwrite?").arg( saveFileName ),
00395                         QMessageBox::Ok|QMessageBox::Cancel, QMessageBox::Cancel )
00396                         == QMessageBox::Cancel )
00397                         return;
00398                 QFile::remove( saveFileName );
00399         }
00400         else
00401         {
00402                 QFileInfo fileInfo( saveFileName );
00403                 if( !fileInfo.dir().exists() )
00404                 {
00405                         QDir currentDir( qApp->applicationDirPath() );
00406                         currentDir.cdUp();
00407                         currentDir.cdUp();
00408 
00409                         currentDir.mkpath( fileInfo.dir().path() );
00410                 }
00411 
00412         }
00413 
00414         m_file = new QFile( saveFileName );
00415 
00416         if( !m_file->open( QIODevice::WriteOnly ) )
00417         {
00418                 QMessageBox::information( 0, QLatin1String( "Tonatiuh" ),
00419                         tr("Unable to save the file %1: %2.").arg( saveFileName, m_file->errorString() ) );
00420                 delete m_file;
00421                 m_file = 0;
00422                 return;
00423         }
00424 
00425         m_fileRequestAborted = false ;
00426         m_fileReply = m_networkAccessManager->get( QNetworkRequest( url ) );
00427         connect( m_fileReply, SIGNAL( finished() ), this, SLOT( FileDownloadComplete() ) );
00428         connect( m_fileReply, SIGNAL( readyRead() ), this, SLOT( ReadFile() ) );
00429 
00430 }

00435 void UpdatesManager::RemoveDir( QString dirName )
00436 {
00437         QDir currentDir( dirName );
00438         currentDir.setFilter( QDir::AllEntries | QDir::NoDotAndDotDot );
00439         currentDir.setSorting( QDir::DirsFirst  | QDir::Name );
00440 
00441         QStringList fileList = currentDir.entryList( );
00442 
00443         for( int i = 0; i < fileList.size(); ++i )
00444         {
00445                 QFileInfo fileOrDir( currentDir, fileList[i] );
00446                 if( fileOrDir.isDir() )
00447                 {
00448                         RemoveDir( fileOrDir.filePath() );
00449                         currentDir.rmdir( fileList[i] );
00450                 }
00451                 else currentDir.remove( fileList[i] );
00452         }
00453         currentDir.cdUp();
00454 
00455         currentDir.rmdir( dirName );
00456 }
